content.p: To be more transparent when spending public money, the University of Nottingham publish all awarded contracts that come through our centralised procurement team on this register, details such as awarded supplier and contract value are included. The Contract Register is a public facing, live register which anyone can access and view. To view the UoN Contract Register please click here King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR For queries please email procurement@nottingham.ac.uk.
